Dinn: Many people are depending on you! We need eggs and tissue samples from Pterosaurs, Tyrannosauruses and Velociraptors. Just so you know, 1 Dinosaur Egg and 150 Dinosaur Tissues can be processed as a set. You can find dinosaur eggs by searching near a dinosaur's lair. But once you touch one, any dinosaurs nearby will rush back to protect the egg! We will reward you for whatever you bring back. If you'd like to see a list of reward options, just say "I want to look at other items." Go out and get as much as you can!
